Janoah Gardens

Manly West

Close by to everything you need

The village is close to shops and a council bus stop, and is just a few kilometres from the Gateway motorway.

Plus, the Wynnum-Manly waterfront is just a short drive away. Spend your afternoons strolling along the waterfront and enjoy Brisbane's best fish and chips at sunset.
